column1: Everholt was the name the Rohirrim gave to a section of the Firienholt. It was notorious for its Boar of Everholt
column2: after which the forest was named.

column1: The name means "boar-wood". The first element comes from Old English eofor
column2: "boar". The second element appears also in Dimholt.

column1: Eofor is also a Rohirric name.
